title: Police ID teen fatally shot in SW Houston
content:
A 16-year-old boy was fatally shot Monday morning at an apartment complex in southwest Houston.
Houston police said David Otoniel Charar Yac was shot about 12:30 a.m. at 6301 Ranchester near Bellaire.
Officers were dispatched to the apartment complex after reports of a shooting. When they arrived they found Yac shot dead in the bedroom of his second-story apartment.
Investigators had not identified a motive or suspect.
Anyone with information is urged to contact the HPD Homicide Division at 713 308-3600 or Crime Stoppers at 713 222-TIPS.
